snippet: Five people died in a hostage-taking drama on Wednesday in the southwestern city of Karlsruhe, the police said.
abstract: Five people are killed in a hostage-taking drama in Karlsruhe, Germany; police say the hostage taker, was facing eviction from the apartment he shared with his girlfriend after she lost it in a foreclosure auction; man took his own life after killing his girlfriend, a bailiff, a locksmith and the new owner of the apartment.
lead_paragraph: Five people died in a hostage-taking drama on Wednesday in the southwestern city of Karlsruhe, the police said.

headline.main: Germany: Man Facing Eviction Kills 4 People and Himself
headline.print_headline: Germany: Man Facing Eviction Kills 4 People and Himself
